content: I can’t argue with you: I am awkward.That my humble drawings activated your hilarity center pleases me no end.You should feel free to laugh at my expense at any time, given your love for said activity. Only too happy to oblige.This said, I wonder if perhaps you might not want to have another glance at the comic, as I believe the punchline comes more at the expense of Wife than of yours truly.I can’t argue with you: sometimes paper IS better. But not for umbrellas. Or airplanes. Or body armor.Yes puzzles. Yes also especially crosswords.
